value: In this program, if we are given any number in binary form, then we will learn to convert that number in decimal form.

b_num = list(input("Input a binary number: "))
value = 0
for i in range(len(b_num)):
 digit = b_num.pop()
 if digit == '1':
  value = value + pow(2, i)
print("The decimal value of the number is", value)

Input a binary number: 110011
The decimal value of the number is 51
To convert this number in decimal form:-

last element ko 2^0 yaani 1 se
second last element ko 2^1 yaani 2 se
third last element ko 2^2 yaani 4 se
fourth last element ko 2^3 yaani 8 se
…
…
multiply kar kar
add karna hai
After doing the above steps, you will get 155 as an answer.
